abstract: A new study from Intel pits the Internet versus sex to show how important technology has become.
snippet: A new study from Intel pits the Internet versus sex to show how important technology has become.
lead_paragraph: Intel came up with a novel way to show how important the Internet and computing have become in the lives of Americans. In conjunction with Harris Interactive, the company conducted a survey of adults in the United States under the prosaic banner “Internet Reliance in Today’s Economy.”

headline.main: Survey Asks: Internet Access or Sex?
